properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come and see, look on this mystery The Lord of the universe, nailed to a tree Christ our God, spilling His holy blood Bowing in anguish, His sacred head{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing to Jesus, Lord of our shame Lord of our sinful hearts, He is our great Redeemer Sing to Jesus, honor His name Sing of His faithfulness, pouring His life out unto death{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Come you weary and He will give you rest Come you who mourn, lay on His breast Christ who died, risen in Paradise Giver of mercy, Giver of life{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Sing to Jesus His is the throne Now and forever, He is the King of Heaven Sing to Jesus, we are His own Now and forever sing for the love our God has shown{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
